mapper.update: update b_planfile_detail set plandetailid=plandetailid ,planfileid=#{planfileid} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,producingYear=#{producingYear} ,grade=#{grade} ,qualityRequire=#{qualityRequire} ,tQty=#{tQty} ,kGQty=#{kGQty} ,tPrice=#{tPrice} ,kGPrice=#{kGPrice} ,calcAmt=#{calcAmt} ,oSPlanTQty=#{oSPlanTQty} ,iSPlanTQty=#{iSPlanTQty} ,remark=#{remark} ,planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} ,planEndDate=#{planEndDate} where plandetailid=#{plandetailid}

update b_planfile_detail set plandetailid=plandetailid ,planfileid=#{planfileid} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,producingYear=#{producingYear} ,grade=#{grade} ,qualityRequire=#{qualityRequire} ,tQty=#{tQty} ,kGQty=#{kGQty} ,tPrice=#{tPrice} ,kGPrice=#{kGPrice} ,calcAmt=#{calcAmt} ,oSPlanTQty=#{oSPlanTQty} ,iSPlanTQty=#{iSPlanTQty} ,remark=#{remark} ,planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} ,planEndDate=#{planEndDate} where 1=1 and plandetailid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and plandetailid =#{Where_Id} and plandetailid=#{Where_plandetailid} and planfileid=#{Where_planfileid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and grainattrid=#{Where_grainattrid} and producingYear=#{Where_producingYear} and grade=#{Where_grade} and qualityRequire=#{Where_qualityRequire} and tQty=#{Where_tQty} and kGQty=#{Where_kGQty} and tPrice=#{Where_tPrice} and kGPrice=#{Where_kGPrice} and calcAmt=#{Where_calcAmt} and oSPlanTQty=#{Where_oSPlanTQty} and iSPlanTQty=#{Where_iSPlanTQty} and remark=#{Where_remark} and planBeginDate=#{Where_planBeginDate} and planEndDate=#{Where_planEndDate}
mapper.select: select t.plandetailid "plandetailid", t.planfileid "planfileid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingYear "producingYear", t.grade "grade", t.qualityRequire "qualityRequire", t.tQty "tQty", t.kGQty "kGQty", t.tPrice "tPrice", t.kGPrice "kGPrice", t.calcAmt "calcAmt", t.oSPlanTQty "oSPlanTQty", t.iSPlanTQty "iSPlanTQty", t.remark "remark", t.planBeginDate "planBeginDate", t.planEndDate "planEndDate" from b_planfile_detail t where plandetailid=#{plandetailid}

select t.plandetailid "plandetailid", t.planfileid "planfileid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingYear "producingYear", t.grade "grade", t.qualityRequire "qualityRequire", t.tQty "tQty", t.kGQty "kGQty", t.tPrice "tPrice", t.kGPrice "kGPrice", t.calcAmt "calcAmt", t.oSPlanTQty "oSPlanTQty", t.iSPlanTQty "iSPlanTQty", t.remark "remark", t.planBeginDate "planBeginDate", t.planEndDate "planEndDate" from b_planfile_detail t where 1=1 and t.plandetailid=#{plandetailid} and t.planfileid=#{planfileid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingYear=#{producingYear} and t.grade=#{grade} and t.qualityRequire=#{qualityRequire} and t.tQty=#{tQty} and t.kGQty=#{kGQty} and t.tPrice=#{tPrice} and t.kGPrice=#{kGPrice} and t.calcAmt=#{calcAmt} and t.oSPlanTQty=#{oSPlanTQty} and t.iSPlanTQty=#{iSPlanTQty} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} and t.planEndDate=#{planEndDate}

select t.plandetailid "plandetailid", t.planfileid "planfileid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingYear "producingYear", t.grade "grade", t.qualityRequire "qualityRequire", t.tQty "tQty", t.kGQty "kGQty", t.tPrice "tPrice", t.kGPrice "kGPrice", t.calcAmt "calcAmt", t.oSPlanTQty "oSPlanTQty", t.iSPlanTQty "iSPlanTQty", t.remark "remark", t.planBeginDate "planBeginDate", t.planEndDate "planEndDate" from b_planfile_detail t where 1=1 and t.plandetailid=#{plandetailid} and t.planfileid=#{planfileid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingYear=#{producingYear} and t.grade=#{grade} and t.qualityRequire=#{qualityRequire} and t.tQty=#{tQty} and t.kGQty=#{kGQty} and t.tPrice=#{tPrice} and t.kGPrice=#{kGPrice} and t.calcAmt=#{calcAmt} and t.oSPlanTQty=#{oSPlanTQty} and t.iSPlanTQty=#{iSPlanTQty} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} and t.planEndDate=#{planEndDate}
mapper.delete: delete from b_planfile_detail where 1=1 and plandetailid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and plandetailid =#{Where_Id} and plandetailid=#{Where_plandetailid} and planfileid=#{Where_planfileid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and grainattrid=#{Where_grainattrid} and producingYear=#{Where_producingYear} and grade=#{Where_grade} and qualityRequire=#{Where_qualityRequire} and tQty=#{Where_tQty} and kGQty=#{Where_kGQty} and tPrice=#{Where_tPrice} and kGPrice=#{Where_kGPrice} and calcAmt=#{Where_calcAmt} and oSPlanTQty=#{Where_oSPlanTQty} and iSPlanTQty=#{Where_iSPlanTQty} and remark=#{Where_remark} and planBeginDate=#{Where_planBeginDate} and planEndDate=#{Where_planEndDate}
mapper.select: select t.plandetailid "plandetailid", t.planfileid "planfileid", t.grainid "grainid", t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.producingYear "producingYear", t.grade "grade", t.qualityRequire "qualityRequire", t.tQty "tQty", t.kGQty "kGQty", t.tPrice "tPrice", t.kGPrice "kGPrice", t.calcAmt "calcAmt", t.oSPlanTQty "oSPlanTQty", t.iSPlanTQty "iSPlanTQty", t.remark "remark", t.planBeginDate "planBeginDate", t.planEndDate "planEndDate", pf.planNo "planNo", pf.planTypeID "planTypeID", lg.grainname "grainname", lga.grainattrname "grainattrname" from b_planfile_detail t LEFT JOIN b_planfile pf on pf.planfileid=t.planfileid LEFT JOIN l_grain lg on lg.grainid=t.grainid LEFT JOIN l_grainattr lga on lga.grainattrid=t.grainattrid where 1=1 and t.plandetailid=#{plandetailid} and t.planfileid=#{planfileid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingYear=#{producingYear} and t.grade=#{grade} and t.qualityRequire=#{qualityRequire} and t.tQty=#{tQty} and t.kGQty=#{kGQty} and t.tPrice=#{tPrice} and t.kGPrice=#{kGPrice} and t.calcAmt=#{calcAmt} and t.oSPlanTQty=#{oSPlanTQty} and t.iSPlanTQty=#{iSPlanTQty} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} and t.planEndDate=#{planEndDate}

select count(*) from b_planfile_detail t where 1=1 and t.plandetailid=#{plandetailid} and t.plandetailid!=#{NoId} and t.planfileid=#{planfileid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.producingYear=#{producingYear} and t.grade=#{grade} and t.qualityRequire=#{qualityRequire} and t.tQty=#{tQty} and t.kGQty=#{kGQty} and t.tPrice=#{tPrice} and t.kGPrice=#{kGPrice} and t.calcAmt=#{calcAmt} and t.oSPlanTQty=#{oSPlanTQty} and t.iSPlanTQty=#{iSPlanTQty} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.planBeginDate=#{planBeginDate} and t.planEndDate=#{planEndDate}
